author: Davis
title: Rob Schneider Gets Attacked From the Left After Making Honest Tweet About MLK Day
text:
Parents Cut Off Daughter After She Brings Home Black Boyfriend 
Predictably, it didn’t take long for the triggered masses to start accusing Schneider of racism. Rep. Lewis. You are a great person. But Dr. King didn't give in to his anger or his hurt. That is how he accomplished & won Civil Rights. 
— Rob Schneider (@RobSchneider) January 16, 2017 
Some tweets referenced characters Schneider played in his comedies, and criticized him for having the audacity to voice his opinion on something.   
One tweet claimed that Schneider was attempting to “whitesplain” MLK to Lewis — a term that is something only some triggered liberal could have come up with in their safe space while cuddling a puppy. Rob Schneider lecturing @repjohnlewis is the most embarrassing thing he's ever done. Yes, this includes The Animal. 
— Wil Wheaton (@wilw) January 16, 2017 
This is liberal logic 101: if you don’t like what someone has said, accuse them of racism and attempt to paint their argument as one made by those who are simply too ignorant to understand anything. . @RobSchneider don't whitesplain mlk to the man who literally sat at the table with mlk pic.twitter.com/oAg4VqlEb4 
— Oliver Willis (@owillis) January 16, 2017 
Schneider never insulted Lewis , or attempted to rewrite MLK’s history. He simply pointed out facts that seem to have been forgotten in this hyper-partisan atmosphere we are living in.
